original: intros p L1 L2 H q H0. induction H0. - apply reducep_nil in H0. exists p. apply H0. - destruct (H r1) as [r2 [H1 H2]]. apply H0. apply H. apply In_cons. + apply H1. + apply H2. + apply H1. apply IHreducep in H1. destruct H1 as [r [H3 H4]]. exists r. split. + apply In_cons. * apply H3. * apply H4. + apply H2.
